<WG3588> But The <WG1161> Ship <WG4143> Now In <WG2235> The Midst <WG3319> Of The <WG3588> Sea <WG2281> Was, <WG2258> Tossed <WG928> By <WG5259> The <WG3588> Waves, <WG2949> Was <WG2258> For <WG1063> Contrary <WG1727> The <WG3588> Wind. <WG417>
